socks.name: bert_socks
socks.explain: Not Bidirectional Encoder Representation Transformers. Just a plain BERT sock:)

socks.name: big_bird_socks
socks.explain: A very strong and big sock, just like how big BigBird is!

socks.name: black_socks
socks.explain: Do you know that every human being is divided into those who like black socks or those who like white socks?

socks.name: red_socks
socks.explain: Red is one of the most enthusiastic color in the world, just like Spain!

socks.name: orange_socks
socks.explain: Orange is a very delightful color just like the taste of the fruit!

socks.name: yellow_socks
socks.explain: If BigBird or BERT looks too much, probably plain yellow is a good choice for you.

socks.name: green_socks
socks.explain: Although the spectrum of green varies, Soaked Socks provides the most charming green color.

socks.name: blue_socks
socks.explain: Do you like the ocean? This sock will remind you of the summer seas.

socks.name: navy_socks
socks.explain: I bet that every men had a navy colored sock when they were young:)

socks.name: purple_socks
socks.explain: A very mania color. If you want to feel special just the right choice for you!

socks.name: white_socks
socks.explain: The most general sock color, yet the best choice.

socks.name: buddha_birthday_socks
socks.explain: If there's christmas socks, why wouldn't there be Buddha's?

socks.name: christmas_socks
socks.explain: This one, you can also use to put candies inside at Chirstmas!

socks.name: cookiemonster_socks
socks.explain: The character kids like the most in Seaseme Street!

socks.name: newyears_socks
socks.explain: Happy new years! Why don't you celebrate your new years with these socks?

socks.name: elmo_socks
socks.explain: Not ELMo Representations to find contextual meaning, but just plain good old ELMO socks for kids:)

socks.name: ernie_socks
socks.explain: The one who's always next to BERT. Nice colors for socks.

socks.name: rainbow_socks
socks.explain: I'd bet every men/women would have a crush on you if you go out with these ones on your date:)

socks.name: thanksgiving_socks
socks.explain: Ready for your roasted turkey? With these socks on, you woould have a more tasteable dinner party!
